   contain the root `toctree` directive.

MUN GNC grad course Fall 2019
=============================

| **Course Name**: Guidance Navigation and Control
|
| **Instructor**: Dr. Oscar De Silva (oscar.desilva@mun.ca)
| 

This website contains lecture notes and examples needed to help completing your course projec on navigation system design. The notes were generated using jupyter notebooks corresponding to each topic which can be accessed using the github repository of this site for experimenting with code examples shown here.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Modelling Navigation Systems:

   jupyter/iGN_topic_1.ipynb
   jupyter/iGN_topic_2.ipynb
   jupyter/iGN_topic_3.ipynb
